title: Ping Still 100+. It has been 25 for 2 years..
body: I asked for a fix before, he told me to run a test, which I did, then he never followed up. I've always had outstanding ping, until patch 7.2, it went to 100+ always. From a constant 25 to 100+, theres no way thats on my end, the test results show it too. Fix it please

replies.body: same issue here, from a constant 15 to 60, and I believe this happened when 7.2 patch released  wtf riot, I live in chicago.

my ms has been at about 500 to 600 ping for about a week randomly. i dont understand what is going on and all i want is an answer. I've restarted my router about 6 times and nothing is working. please help

I checked into your previous post with Targons Blade to look at your routing.  I had a previous response, but something caught my eye- it looks like your router is starting off with a higher ping from the start.  Do you have your own router or are you using your ISP's?  If you haven't yet, try restarting your router.  We need to make sure that your router's strength is strong before I'm convinced the issue is being caused elsewhere.  You can also use the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help with that.  Test it out in a custom game and let me know.

Multiple people including myself are having this exact issue... how is that not enough evidence that it's an issue with the game? My internet browser works 100% as it should, but the game has been unplayable for the last 2 weeks. I've tried restarting my computer, and even re-installing the whole game. Please address this!
